description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Your planet is orbiting into certain doom at the center of the solar system. Build rockets to pilot your people to the safety of nearby planets. Beware of asteroids and alien invaders who use a death ray to destroy the people on your planet. Use nukes to clear asteroids and aliens from your path. Keep an eye out for power-ups, and use nukes to take them down and reap the benefits.
